text: A dryer (or drier) can mean: * Hair dryer * Hand dryer * Clothes dryer, also known as a tumble-dryer * Belt dryer * Cereal dryer, for food preservation * Desiccant, a substance that absorbs or adsorbs water * Grain dryer for storage grain bins * Oil drying agent, an additive which accelerates the film formation of a drying oil ==People== * Dryer (surname) == Music == * Dryer (band), a Saratoga Springs, NY based band ==See also== *Dreier *Dreyer *Drying
title: Dryer
